short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters out off-site content on Quora

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to The Qure extension! This is for people who don`t like off-Quora links or Anonymous Questions appearing in their home feed. You can choose to see such items in a different color, or block them altogether. Quora in no way authorizes, approves of, or likes this product. In fact, they`ll probably sue me.
